snippet: A humanities teacher at the United States Merchant Marine Academy, who had faced dismissal, will also undergo sensitivity training after making a joke in class about the movie theater massacre.
abstract: Professor Gregory F Sullivan of the United States Merchant Marine Academy is suspended for 45 days after making a joke in class about the Colorado movie theater shootings; Sullivan, who faced termination, is also required to attend sensitivity training; father of one of the students in Sullivan's class was among the 12 killed in the Aurora shooting.
lead_paragraph: A humanities teacher at the United States Merchant Marine Academy, who had faced dismissal, will also undergo sensitivity training after making a joke in class about the movie theater massacre.

headline.seo: Merchant Marine Academy Professor Won’t Be Fired for Colorado Shooting Joke
headline.main: Professor Suspended Over Colorado Shootings Joke
headline.print_headline: Professor Suspended 45 Days For Colorado Shootings Joke
